display_name: The Knox Event in Real Time
note:
Exactly 30 years ago, in July 1993, the Knox Event changed the world forever.

This account commemorates that moment in history, in real time.

God save us all.

[This account mirrors the content from twitter.com/TheKnoxEvent. This is done manually. I am not associated with The Indie Stone, or Project Zomboid in any way. I'm doing this for fun. My main account is @Kiloku
Since I'm starting "late", I'll repost one tweet per hour until I reach parity with the original account ]
